# Java
*.class
*.jar
*.war
*.ear

# Spring Boot
target/
bin/
out/
*.log

# Maven
.mvn/
target/
pom.xml.tag
pom.xml.releaseBackup
pom.xml.versionsBackup
pom.xml.next
release.properties

# Gradle
.gradle/
build/
!gradle/wrapper/gradle-wrapper.jar

# IntelliJ IDEA
.idea/
*.iml
*.ipr
*.iws

# Eclipse
.project
.classpath
.settings/
.metadata/

# VS Code
.vscode/

# Logs
*.log
logs/
*.pid

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Node / Angular (if frontend is included)
node_modules/
dist/
npm-debug.log*
yarn-debug.log*
yarn-error.log*
.env

# Environment files
*.env
.env.*

# Database
*.db
*.sqlite

# Docker
*.pid
*.seed
*.bak
docker-compose.override.yml

# Test reports
test-output/
coverage/
*.lcov

# Others
*.swp
*.swo
*.tmp
*.bak
*.old
